pullRequest.bodyText:
This is a PR for: DSpace/RestContract#105
A few notes on the implementation:

When creating tests for this one, we bumped into a few bugs in the new xml workflow beans, this PR includes fixed for those.
Some of the community/collections tests had full projections enabled while not being logged in as (community/collection) admin. We needed to alter this as the roles aren't public. Only admins are able to request a full projection.

nodes.bodyText: I think this is missing an @Override
These JavaDocs need enhancing. This Controller manages much more than just the admingroup. It's all special groups for a Collection.
This line should be moved below the if statement just below. There's no reason to load the Group if you don't have access to it.
This if clause should be moved up. There's no reason to load the DEFAULT_BITSTREAM_READ group if you don't have access to it.
Same here, move this up. We want to check permissions closer to the top of the method.
Again, move the authorization check above the line which loads the group.
Same here, move the authorization check up
This method appears to be misnamed. It's only creating *_DEFAULT_READ groups, and not just any group.  It probably should be named createDefaultReadGroup or similar so that its purpose is clear.
Please do not leave authorization turned off across test methods.  This can result in unexpected behavior.  It should only be temporarily turned off to create (or delete) test content.
Please do not leave authorization turned off across test methods.  This can result in unexpected behavior.  It should only be temporarily turned off to create (or delete) test content.

Please update this to create its own Context, similar to deleteWorkflowGroups(). I've run into occasional Hibernate issues with reusing the global context for deletion of test data.  The best practice is the method used in deleteWorkflowGroups() which uses a try to open a new context, then deletes & completes.
